argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | 1idl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | 1idl.2 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 3 |  | 1idl.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | 1idl.4 | |- U = ( GId ` H ) |
| 5 | 1, 3 | #P_idlss | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> I C_ X ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ U e. I ) -> I C_ X ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_rneqi | |- ran G = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_eqtri | |- X = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 9 | 2, 8, 4 | #P_rngolidm | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ x e. X ) -> ( U H x ) = x ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ad2ant2rl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( U e. I /\ x e. X ) ) -> ( U H x ) = x ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_idlrmulcl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( U e. I /\ x e. X ) ) -> ( U H x ) e. I ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( U e. I /\ x e. X ) ) -> x e. I ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_expr | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ U e. I ) -> ( x e. X -> x e. I ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_ssrdv | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ U e. I ) -> X C_ I ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_eqssd | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ U e. I ) -> I = X ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ex | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> ( U e. I -> I = X ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 2, 4 | #P_rngo1cl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> U e. X ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> U e. X ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eleq2 | |- ( I = X -> ( U e. I <-> U e. X ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> ( I = X -> U e. I ) ) |
| 21 | 16, 20 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> ( U e. I <-> I = X ) ) |
